BioMAJ cron service REST API¶

biomaj-cron REST API reference¶

biomaj_cron.biomaj_cron_web.add_cron(cron_name)¶
POST /api/cron/jobs/(str: id)¶

Update or add a cron task

Request JSON Object:
 
  • dict – cron info containing slices, banks and comment comment is the name to be used for the new task banks is the list of banks to be udpated, comma separated slices is the cron time info in cron format (example: * * * * *)
Response JSON Object:
 
  • dict – status message
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – no error
biomaj_cron.biomaj_cron_web.delete_cron(cron_name)¶
DELETE /api/cron/jobs/(str: id)¶

Delete a cron task

Response JSON Object:
 
  • dict – status message
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – no error
biomaj_cron.biomaj_cron_web.list_cron()¶
GET /api/cron/jobs¶

Get list of cron tasks

Response JSON Object:
 
  • dict – list of cron tasks and query status
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – no error
biomaj_cron.biomaj_cron_web.ping()¶
GET /api/cron¶

Ping endpoint to test service availability :>json dict: pong message :statuscode 200: no error
